attributes.action: restore the feel good factor to working in a service for those not feeling so good
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dirty NHS ambulances could be contributing to the spread of bugs like MRSA, a union has claimed. Further to the petitioner's earlier online submitted suggestions for addressing MRSA infection control, the petitioner is inviting the P.M. to appoint a regional team on - site cleaning team, such as that highlighted for its good practice in the London Ambulance Service, in the North - West, and commission mandatory rules, which UNISON states are needed (the petitioner's private contact details follow).

rejection.details: Please give a clear action for HM Government
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
